2025-12-09T02:17:38.8002488Z [36;1mnpx prisma generate[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8002693Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8002891Z [36;1mecho "--- 2. MONTAGEM DO PACOTE ---"[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8003147Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8003377Z [36;1mmkdir -p deploy[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8003576Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8003746Z [36;1m# Copia o App Next.js[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8003983Z [36;1mcp -R .next/standalone/. deploy/[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8004217Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8004468Z [36;1m# Copia estáticos (mas vamos limpar os pesados depois)[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8004831Z [36;1mif [ -d public ]; then cp -R public deploy/public; fi[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8005183Z [36;1mmkdir -p deploy/.next/static[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8005811Z [36;1mcp -R .next/static/. deploy/.next/static[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8006061Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8006267Z [36;1mcp next.config.mjs deploy/next.config.mjs[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8006639Z [36;1mcp staticwebapp.config.json deploy/staticwebapp.config.json[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8006963Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8007157Z [36;1mecho "--- 3. INJEÇÃO DO MOTOR PRISMA ---"[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8007466Z [36;1mmkdir -p deploy/node_modules/.prisma/client[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8007739Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8007919Z [36;1m# Copia o motor Alpine (musl)[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8008340Z [36;1mENGINE_PATH=$(find . -not -path "./deploy/*" -name "libquery_engine-linux-musl*.node" | head -n 1)[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8008764Z [36;1mif [ -z "$ENGINE_PATH" ]; then[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8009045Z [36;1m  echo "❌ ERRO: Motor Alpine não encontrado!"[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8009311Z [36;1m  exit 1[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8009488Z [36;1mfi[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8009718Z [36;1mcp "$ENGINE_PATH" deploy/node_modules/.prisma/client/[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8010022Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8010238Z [36;1mecho "--- 4. DIETA DO PACOTE (CIRÚRGICA) ---"[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8010500Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8010690Z [36;1m# AÇÃO 1: Remover o Sharp (Incompatível)[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8010968Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/node_modules/sharp[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8011225Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/node_modules/@img[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8011486Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/node_modules/libvips[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8011722Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8011982Z [36;1m# AÇÃO 2: Remover Motores Prisma Inúteis (Debian/Ubuntu, Mac, Windows)[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8012357Z [36;1m# Mantemos APENAS o 'musl' que copiamos acima[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8012713Z [36;1mfind deploy/node_modules -name "*debian-openssl*" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8013090Z [36;1mfind deploy/node_modules -name "*darwin*" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8013430Z [36;1mfind deploy/node_modules -name "*windows*" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8013764Z [36;1mfind deploy/node_modules -name "*rhel*" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8014032Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8014241Z [36;1m# AÇÃO 3: Remover Binários SWC do Ubuntu (Pesados!)[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8014614Z [36;1m# O Next traz o 'linux-x64-gnu' (Ubuntu) e o 'linux-x64-musl' (Alpine).[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8014978Z [36;1m# Precisamos apagar o GNU e deixar o MUSL.[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8015687Z [36;1mfind deploy/node_modules/@next -name "swc-linux-x64-gnu" -type d -exec rm -rf {} +[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8016445Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8016671Z [36;1m# AÇÃO 4: Esvaziar pasta Public da FUNCTION[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8017115Z [36;1m# (Os arquivos estáticos já foram subidos para o CDN na etapa de build padrão)[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8017616Z [36;1m# A Function não precisa dos vídeos MP4/MOV, apenas o navegador precisa.[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8018199Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.mp4" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8018497Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.mov" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8018776Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.jpg" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8019067Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.png" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8019312Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8019481Z [36;1m# AÇÃO 5: Limpeza Geral[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8019705Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/docs[0m
2025-12-09T02:17:38.8019919Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/logs[0m
